entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
